salaryExpectations: LKR 150,000 to LKR 600,000+ per month, often based on commissions or project fees.
requiredSkills: Deep knowledge of education systems (local and foreign)
futureOutlook: The demand for study-abroad counseling is a major driver for this profession in Sri Lanka. Consultants who can provide expert guidance on universities, visa processes, and career paths are highly sought after. There are also growing opportunities in corporate training, teacher training, and advising educational institutions on curriculum and strategy.
